hypothesis_content.title: Coinbase Stock-Crypto Convergence Catalyst
hypothesis_content.statement: Coinbase stock trading rollout announcement (Dec 22-26 window) will create 1-day lead-lag relationship where COIN stock price movement precedes BTC/ETH price movement by 2-4 hours with >70% directional accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Coinbase serves as sentiment proxy for US crypto adoption. Stock-trading rollout expands their TAM, interpreted as bullish for crypto ecosystem. Retail traders react to COIN news before adjusting crypto positions.
entry_conditions: COIN stock moves >3% in either direction during US market hours
Crypto futures open interest increases within 1 hour of COIN move
No concurrent major crypto-specific news (±30 minutes)
BTC and ETH correlation >0.8 over previous 24 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC/ETH achieves 50% of COIN's percentage move
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC/ETH moves opposite direction to COIN by 1.5%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: COIN moves >3% with <40% correlation to subsequent BTC/ETH moves across 5+ instances during catalyst window.
